name: Implement fair rounding
instruction:
In this problem we implement almost fair rounding - if the fractional part of the number is greater than or equal to 0.6, then the number is rounded up, otherwise it is rounded down.

The `round` function accepts only positive numbers and returns rounded values.

Examples of running the function:
```javascript
round(1.1) // 1
round(1.5) // 1
round(1.55) // 1
round(1.6) // 2
round(1.9) // 2
```
